comment: The <polygon> element defines a closed shape consisting of a set of connected straight line segments. The last point is connected to the first point.

attributes.name: points
attributes.comment:
This attribute defines the list of points (pairs of x,y absolute coordinates) required to draw the polygon. 
Value type: <number>+ ; Default value: ""; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: pathLength
attributes.comment:
This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units. 
Value type: <number> ; Default value: none; Animatable: yes
